title: Adelaide: Vintage City
brief_description: A panoramic view of the pleasures awaiting visitors to Adelaide, a city set among vineyards, garden suburbs, the sea and the Loft Mountain Ranges. Includes sporting events and the attractive parks, restaurants and lakes.
description: A panoramic view of the pleasures awaiting visitors to Adelaide, a city set among vineyards, garden suburbs, the sea and the Loft Mountain Ranges. Includes sporting events and the attractive parks, restaurants and lakes.
